statusLine.command: input=$(cat); model=$(echo "$input" | jq -r '.model.display_name'); dir=$(basename "$(echo "$input" | jq -r '.workspace.current_dir')"); remaining=$(echo "$input" | jq -r '.context_window.remaining_percentage // empty'); context_info=''; [ -n "$remaining" ] && context_info=" | Context: ${remaining}% remaining"; printf "\033[36m%s\033[0m \033[33m%s\033[0m%s" "$model" "$dir" "$context_info"
